sources.title: Ride, Ranger, Ride (1936)
sources.description: It is the story of Gene's, a Cavalry scout, who manages to quell an Indian uprising. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/ride-ranger-ride-1936/

sources.title: Ride Ranger Ride
sources.description: Gene Autry is a Texas Ranger working undercover to protect an Army wagon train full of ammunition and supplies from Indian attack. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Ride Ranger Ride
sources.description: Taken from IMDB : Gene is a Texas Ranger working under cover to protect an Army wagon train full of ammunition and supplies.

metadata.Plot: Gene is a Texas Ranger working under cover to protect an Army wagon train full of ammunition and supplies. The Army doesn't believe him at first, until the Commanches arrive.
metadata.Writer: Dorrell McGowan, Stuart E. McGowan, Bernard McConville
metadata.Actors: Gene Autry, Smiley Burnette, Kay Hughes
